name: Performance Consistency
description: Response time requirements must be consistent across all specifications
condition: response_time specifications must not contradict each other

name: Security Consistency
description: Security standards and encryption requirements must align
condition: encryption_standard specifications must be compatible across all components

name: Scalability Planning
description: Scalability approach must be feasible given resource constraints
condition: throughput requirements and resource constraints must align
message: Scalability specifications may be unrealistic given constraints

name: Architectural Alignment
description: Proposed architecture must support all performance and reliability requirements
condition: performance targets must be achievable with proposed architecture
message: Specified requirements conflict with proposed architecture

name: Data Handling Consistency
description: Data storage and retrieval patterns must be consistent across specifications
condition: database and caching strategies must align
message: Data handling specifications may be inconsistent

name: Compliance Standards
description: All specifications must meet required compliance standards
condition: GDPR, HIPAA, SOC2 and other standards must be respected
message: Specifications do not meet required compliance standards
